name: Car Police Chase - Thief City
description:
Car Police Chase - Thief City is the best cops car driving simulator of the thief and police chase games in cars.Bring us to top by playing chases and feels the adrenaline of the car racing while cops pursuing thieves. It relieves racing fever with an hot pursuit of the type of police vs. thief. When you're bored in the car without internet and you not want to stop your pursuit of happiness, then, is a good moment to enjoy of police chasing games.
Features of Games:
- Easy simple smooth and relaxed control.
- Race the way you want! You can be cops.
- Nice and attractive sounds of city roads racing cars.
- Multiple thrilling and challenging levels.
- thrill competition among cops inspector and gangsters.
